channel.title: China on Jefferson's Wheel
channel.description: Recent content in China on Jefferson's Wheel

item.title: Lessons from the Last 3000 Years of Adversarial Examples
item.description:
I spoke on Lessons from the Last 3000 Years of Adversarial Examples at Huaweiâ€™s Strategy and Technology Workshop in Shenzhen, China, 15 May 2018. We also got to tour Huawei’s new research and development campus, under construction about 40 minutes from Shenzhen. It is pretty close to Disneyland, with its own railroad and villages themed after different European cities (Paris, Bologna, etc.).
Huawei’s New Research and Development Campus [More Pictures]
